text: Watermelon video privacy policy
Update date: March 31, 2022
Effective date: April 7, 2022

"Watermelon Video" refers to the client application that is legally owned and operated by the Beijing Bittage beating Technology Co., Ltd. (now Beijing Douyin Information Service Co., Ltd.) and its related parties (hereinafter referred to as "we").Programs (also containing different versions such as watermelon video horizontal screens), "watermelon video" websites (ixigua.com), and Internet TV provided content services (including but not limited to "watermelon video" and Internet TV broadcast control integration institutionsPlatforms that cooperate with Internet TV content brand licenses and platforms that cooperate with smart TV manufacturers) and related clients (including but not limited to APP, APK, SDK, API and other methods).

As operators of watermelon videos, we know the importance of personal information to you. Your trust is very important to us. We will protect your personal information and privacy security in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations.

We formulate this "privacy policy" and special reminders: I hope you can read and understand the privacy policy carefully before using watermelon videos and related services to make appropriate choices.
This privacy policy will help you understand:

We will follow your information to collect and use your information, but we will not collect personal information in a package of compulsory binding because you agree with your consent of this privacy policy.
When you use or open related functions or use services, we will collect and use relevant information for the implementation of functions and services.

Unless it is necessary to achieve business functions, or the necessary information necessary for laws and regulations, or if we can collect information according to law without obtaining information you authorize, you can refuse to provide and not affect other functions or services.
We will explain the information we want to collect in the privacy policy.

If you only want to use the basic function provided by you with watermelon video, you can enter the basic function mode through the [Personal Information Protection Guidelines] through the Watermelon Video APP, or [Mine] - [Settings] - [[Settings] - [Basic function mode] Open or close the basic functional mode.
If you do not log in to the account, we will ensure the basic functions of information push through the identifier information corresponding to the device.
If you log in to your account, we will push information according to account information.

In order to achieve business functions or necessary in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, we will collect and use your sensitive personal information when you use specific functions or services. For specific collection of scenes, purposes, and scope, please see the sensitive personal information list.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect and use sensitive personal information when using specific functions or services. For specific collection of scenes, purposes, and scope, please see the sensitive personal information list.

text: Accurate geographical location, camera (camera), microphone, album (storage), and calendar permissions will not be opened by default. Only by your explicit authorization can you use it when you implement specific functions or services, and you can also withdraw authorization.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: Accurate geographical location, camera (camera), microphone, album (storage), and calendar permissions will not be opened by default. Only by explicitly authorization will it be used when realizing specific functions, or the authorization can be withdrawn.

text: In particular, it is necessary to point out that even after your authorization, we have obtained these sensitive permissions, and we will not collect your information when related functions or services are not needed.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
Data Security
rewrite: Even after authorization, these sensitive permissions are obtained, and you will not collect your information at the time of related functions or services.

text: Application permission application and usage description

Unless otherwise explained, this privacy policy is suitable for watermelon video service providers with watermelon video (including watermelon video, watermelon video horizontal screen version, and follow -up series versions we provide and clearly apply for this privacy policy)Watermelon video software development tool packages (SDK) and application programming interface (API) used by small programs, third -party websites and applications, and products and services provided by you with innovative forms with the development of technology.
If you use a certain or more service provided by us or related companies to you, if you have a separate privacy policy, the corresponding service or the corresponding privacy policy is applicable;
If a separate privacy policy is not established, this policy is also applicable to this part of the product or service.
The following will help you understand how we collect, use, store, transfer (as applicable) and protect personal information;
Help you understand the way to check, copy, correct, delete, and withdraw authorization of personal information.

This policy is closely related to your service relationship. We recommend that you read and understand all the contents of this policy, make a proper choice you think, and the important content of your personal information rights and interests.Essence
1. How do we collect and use personal information
2. How do we use cookie equivalent technologies
3. Partners involved in the data use process, transfer, and disclose personal information
4. How do we store personal information
5. How can we protect the security of personal information
6. Personalized recommendation
7. Manage your personal information
8. Terms of minors
9. Consultation and revision of privacy policies
10. Contact us
1. How do we collect and use personal information
We will collect the information you actively provided when using the service, and collect the information you generated during the use of function or accepting service through automation:
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect the active provided by you when using the service as follows, and collect information through automatic means:

text: 1.1 Registration, login, certification, recovery
1.1.1 Registration, login

a. When you register, log in to watermelon videos and related services, you can create an account through your mobile phone number, and you can improve the relevant network identification information (avatar, nickname, password), collect this information to help you complete the registration.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You can create an account with your mobile phone number, and you can improve the relevant network identification information (avatar, nickname, password).

text: Mobile phone numbers are necessary information to fulfill the requirements of national laws and regulations on the requirements of the online real -name system. If you do not provide mobile phone numbers for registration and login, we may not be able to provide you with functions such as information release and comments.

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not provide mobile phone numbers for registration and login, we may not be able to provide you with functions such as information release and comments.

First Party Collection Information

text: b. Based on our cooperation with communication operators, when you use watermelon video "one -click login" function, after your consent, we will process your mobile phone number with the operator to provide you with a fast login service.

If the above processing is refused, you will not be able to register the watermelon video in the "one -click login" method, but it will not affect your registered login in other ways, nor does it affect the normal use of other functions.

c. You can also use a third -party account to log in and use watermelon videos. After your consent, we will obtain the public information (avatar, nickname, and other information you authorized) registered on the third -party platform for watermelon video accountBinding, so that you can log in and use this product and related services directly.

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: After consent, the public information registered by a third -party platform (avatar, nickname, and other information you authorized) will be obtained for binding with watermelon video accounts.

text: d. When you log in to a third -party application with a watermelon video account, after your consent, third -party applications will use your nickname, avatar and other information you authorize.

e. In order to ensure that in different products provide you with consistent services, affiliate products with corresponding connections with the function provides services through the service platform system.

Within the service scope of the platform system, we will collect and process your personal information with the above -mentioned affiliate products, and create a unified digital logo in different products for the mobile phone number you registered to use to achieve the functionConsistency.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will collect and process your personal information with the above -mentioned affiliate products.

2. How do we use cookie equivalent technologies

6. Personalized recommendation

In order to show you and recommend more information and advertisements, provide services that meet your requirements more. First Party Collection Information

8.1 General Terms of Minor
a. We attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors.
